question: I want to get married but there us no space in our house,i usually sleep in lounge because my gran uses my room! What should i do?
answer:
QUESTION
I want to get married but there us no space in our house,i usually sleep in lounge because my gran uses my room!What should i doe as i can not afford to get my own place&i want to stop making ZINA!mufti saab PLS HELP ME!Is it right that my cuzins & aunties come to our house&have meals with us every day,they only go home late at night!
ANSWER


Share:
MashaAllah that you want to stop sin and marry to prevent zina. Good! Repent sincerely with tears with the firm intention never to resort to zina, regret on your sin, feel remorse from the bottom of your heart. Plead to Almighty Allah Ta'ala. Remember, adultery leads to poverty, shortens the lifespan and other effects Change. Make dua for halaal rizq and do not lose hope in the mercy of Allah Ta'ala%0D%0A%0D%0ABesides this factor there seems to other social problems on the need for family to eat and visit daily. Focus on earning halaal rizq and staying away from sin. Gain the closeness to Allah Ta'ala. Insha Allah if you work honestly and with effort there is a market out there. Our Creator is Raaziq-Provider. Have hope in Him to take you out from adversity to prosperity with barakat, happines and good marriage. But remember continuing to sin will eventualy lead to destruction. May Alah Ta'ala make your path easy and solve your difficulties.%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0A2SOCIAL DEPT.%0D%0A%0D%0ACHECKED & APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
